com.robindrew.common.lang.reflect.field

Class FieldMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robindrew.common.lang.reflect.field.FieldMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<IField>

    public final class FieldMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<IField>
    A Map of non-static fields (which are all accessible.
